ch0252_00_kabu/0101_0701_02_10:
We’re gonna be on fire today! Let’s kick off with
a warm up!
ch0252_00_kabu/7101_0701_01_10:
Seeing young Trainers work hard sets my soul
ablaze with determination!
ch0252_00_kabu/7101_0701_02_10:
As long as we’re alive, we should keep on
learning and training!
ch0252_00_kabu/7102_0701_01_10:
Maintaining a career as a Trainer doesn’t just
mean staying sharp in battles—you have to tend
to your health as well!
ch0252_00_kabu/7102_0701_02_10:
Eating, exercising, sleeping... Your day-to-day life
is a part of your training as well!
ch0252_00_kabu/7103_0701_01_10:
No matter what you do, the most important thing is
never forgetting where you started.
ch0252_00_kabu/7103_0701_02_10:
With the right care, you can keep the fire in your
heart burning indefinitely.
ch0252_00_kabu/7103_0701_03_10:
That’s why I’ll always consider myself a
challenger!
ch0252_00_kabu/7104_0701_01_10:
Pasio isn’t just home to young Trainers, but to
veteran Trainers as well!
ch0252_00_kabu/7104_0701_02_10:
I can learn from veteran Trainers and get inspired
by the young ones. It’s truly ideal!
ch0252_00_kabu/7105_0701_01_10:
I’m going to train with the other Fire-type users
next time. Would you like to join us,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0252_00_kabu/7105_0701_02_10:
You won’t regret it—our top-notch Training will
leave you burning red-hot!
ch0252_00_kabu/1701_0701_01_10:
Since you’re aiming for the top, allow me to send
you off with a proper, sporty gift!
ch0252_00_kabu/1701_0702_01_10: Look inward for the things you lack!
ch0252_00_kabu/1701_0702_02_10:
Those who understand their own weaknesses
learn and grow the most!
ch0252_00_kabu/2501_0701_01_10:
There was a time when I kept losing, and I was
struggling to figure out what to do.
ch0252_00_kabu/2501_0701_02_10:
But during a battle against Leon, I realized my
potential, and forged a new path because of that.
ch0252_00_kabu/2501_0701_03_10:
There is no such thing as a dead end in the long
road of life!
ch0252_00_kabu/2501_0702_01_10:
Every day was a challenge back then, but I
toughed it out—and the experience changed me.
ch0252_00_kabu/2501_0702_02_10:
When faced with a problem, it’s important you
take some time to think about ways to tackle it
instead of just giving up.
ch0252_00_kabu/2501_0702_03_10: I’m glad I got to pass all of this on to you!
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0701_01_10:
I’m often regarded as the first real roadblock
of Galar’s Gym Challenge.
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0701_02_10:
As such, I’ve watched many a dispirited Trainer
abandon the Gym Challenge after losing to me...
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0701_03_10:
When Trainers actually manage to defeat me, I
make a point to see them off when they leave
Motostoke.
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0702_01_10: Where there are winners, there must be losers...
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0702_02_10: That’s the harsh reality of battling.
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0702_03_10:
But hanging your head and moping won’t
change anything!
ch0252_00_kabu/2511_0702_04_10:
Just like how fire burns upwards, when things are
tough, keep your head high!
ch0252_00_kabu/3001_0701_01_10:
Good morning! Let’s get on today’s training!
Hup, two, three, four!
ch0252_00_kabu/3003_0701_01_10:
We must make sure we replenish our fuel so
we can keep burning!
ch0252_00_kabu/3005_0701_01_10:
That’s enough for today’s training. Rest up so you
can be in top condition.
